faqs.question: What translation features are available?
faqs.answer:
[image]https://cdn.neoneko.xyz/catsblenderplugin/website/wiki/309889494-ad61a042-7bbb-42e8-b9b8-e3b25460dc63.png[/image]

### Features:
- Translate from Japanese to English
- Export translations to CSV
- Custom CSV export location
- Translates:
  - Shape keys
  - Bones
  - Materials
  - Meshes
